ygData.subject: Re: GZ to publically test lullaby and pixie
ygData.msgSnippet: Ohh sure test it on the test server where you have complete controls and stealth nerfs over the last few down times.. can you say snowjob?  I knew you could.
ygData.messageBody:
Ohh sure test it on the test server where you have complete controls and stealth nerfs over the last few down times.. can you say snowjob? I knew you could. Get him on a production server for Veeshan's sake. What I would really like to see is a seperate bard verant guy because it's obvious where GZ's biases lie after his last several public posts.

Adon Draigcanwyr

-"Hear the voice of the bard who past,present and future sees"- William Blake

On Tue, 11 Jan 2000 06:37:04 -0800 (PST) eqbards@onelist.com wrote:
> From: Katy Westerman <katyw@...>
>
>
> I saw on the Concert Hall that GZ is setting up a meeting on the test
> server for those who want to test out lullaby and pixie strike. The
> meeting is at the Qeynos newbie area at 3pm Pacific, however he didn't
> leave a date as far as I saw. If you're interested, you might want to
> check out the Gameplay board at Sony to see if the date has been
> posted.
>
> Robynn
